quote: For to be free is not merely to cast off one's chains, but to live in a way that respects and enhances the freedom of others.
author: Nelson Mandela

quote: Man is born free, and everywhere he is in chains.
author: Jean-Jacques Rousseau

quote: Freedom is never voluntarily given by the oppressor; it must be demanded by the oppressed.
author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quote: The only real prison is fear, and the only real freedom is freedom from fear.
author: Aung San Suu Kyi

quote: Where the mind is without fear and the head is held high, there knowledge is free.
author: Rabindranath Tagore

quote: Liberty, when it begins to take root, is a plant of rapid growth.
author: George Washington

quote: You can have peace. Or you can have freedom. Don’t ever count on having both at once.
author: Robert A. Heinlein

quote: Freedom consists not in doing what we like, but in having the right to do what we ought.
author: Pope John Paul II

quote: No one is free, even the birds are chained to the sky.
author: Bob Dylan

quote: The most courageous act is still to think for yourself. Aloud.
author: Coco Chanel

quote: Freedom is never given; it is won.
author: A. Philip Randolph

quote: The only way to deal with an unfree world is to become so absolutely free that your very existence is an act of rebellion.
author: Albert Camus

quote: Freedom lies in being bold.
author: Robert Frost

quote: He who has overcome his fears will truly be free.
author: Aristotle

quote: Freedom is the oxygen of the soul.
author: Moshe Dayan

quote: To enjoy freedom, we must control ourselves.
author: Virginia Woolf

quote: The price of freedom is eternal vigilance.
author: Thomas Jefferson

quote: Lock up your libraries if you like; but there is no gate, no lock, no bolt that you can set upon the freedom of my mind.
author: Virginia Woolf

quote: Freedom is not worth having if it does not include the freedom to make mistakes.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: The truth will set you free, but first it will piss you off.
author: Gloria Steinem

quote: Freedom is what you do with what's been done to you.
author: Jean-Paul Sartre

quote: Those who deny freedom to others deserve it not for themselves.
author: Abraham Lincoln

quote: Art is the daughter of freedom.
author: Friedrich Schiller

quote: The freedom of any society varies proportionately with the volume of its laughter.
author: Tennessee Williams

quote: Freedom is the open window through which pours the sunlight of the human spirit and human dignity.
author: Herbert Hoover

quote: The most powerful weapon on earth is the human soul on fire with freedom.
author: Ferdinand Foch

quote: Freedom is not the absence of commitments, but the ability to choose—and commit myself to—what is best for me.
author: Paulo Coelho

quote: A hero is someone who understands the responsibility that comes with his freedom.
author: Bob Dylan

quote: Freedom is the right to tell people what they do not want to hear.
author: George Orwell

quote: I am no bird; and no net ensnares me; I am a free human being with an independent will.
author: Charlotte Brontë

quote: Freedom cannot be bestowed—it must be achieved.
author: Elbert Hubbard

quote: The desire for freedom resides in every human heart.
author: George W. Bush

quote: Freedom is the will to be responsible to ourselves.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: Better to die fighting for freedom than be a prisoner all the days of your life.
author: Bob Marley

quote: Freedom is what we do with what is done to us.
author: Simone de Beauvoir

quote: No human being is born free, but poetry can make him so.
author: Nizar Qabbani

quote: To be free is not to have the power to do anything; it is to be able to surpass the given toward an open future.
author: Simone de Beauvoir

quote: The free soul is rare, but you know it when you see it—basically because you feel good, very good, when you are near or with them.
author: Charles Bukowski

quote: Freedom is the fire that burns in the heart of every revolutionary.
author: Che Guevara

quote: The moment we break faith with one another, the sea engulfs us and the light goes out.
author: James Baldwin

quote: Freedom is not the absence of fear, but the triumph over it.
author: Nelson Mandela

quote: The secret of happiness is freedom. The secret of freedom is courage.
author: Thucydides

quote: Freedom is the child of education.
author: Frederick Douglass

quote: To be yourself in a world that is constantly trying to make you something else is the greatest accomplishment.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: No one can build their happiness on the unhappiness of others.
author: Daisaku Ikeda

quote: The flame of freedom burns brightest in the darkest nights of oppression.
author: Bhagat Singh

quote: Freedom is not something that anybody can be given. Freedom is something people take.
author: Emma Goldman

quote: A free society is one where it is safe to be unpopular.
author: Adlai Stevenson II

quote: The greatest glory of a free-born people is to transmit that freedom to their children.
author: William Havard

quote: Freedom is the right of every human being to shine their light into the world.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: If you surrender to the wind, you can ride it.
author: Toni Morrison

quote: The free man is he who does not fear to go to the end of his thought.
author: Léon Blum

quote: Freedom is never more than one generation away from extinction.
author: Ronald Reagan

quote: The power to question is the basis of all human progress.
author: Indira Gandhi

quote: The winds of freedom cannot blow without the wings of courage.
author: Kenji Miyazawa

quote: The free bird leaps on the back of the wind and floats downstream.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: Freedom is the marrow of the human soul.
author: Malcolm X

quote: To be free is to live in a way that respects the freedom of others.
author: Robin Wall Kimmerer

quote: The moment you doubt whether you can fly, you cease forever to be able to do it.
author: J.M. Barrie

quote: Freedom is the oxygen without which science cannot breathe.
author: David Baltimore

quote: The only prison that can hold you is the one you build yourself.
author: Haruki Murakami

quote: Freedom is the open sky; slavery is a cage.
author: Sojourner Truth

quote: A cage is a cage, whether the bars are made of iron or gold.
author: African Proverb

quote: Liberty is the breath of life to nations.
author: George Bernard Shaw

quote: Freedom is the right to question everything.
author: Jacob Appelbaum

quote: To be free is to have achieved your identity.
author: Fernando Pessoa

quote: Freedom is the poetry of the soul.
author: Khalil Gibran

quote: If you want to be free, you must first dare to be different.
author: Marianne Williamson

quote: The soul’s freedom is the only true wealth.
author: Swami Vivekananda

quote: Freedom is the courage to say no to the trivial so you can say yes to the essential.
author: Greg McKeown

quote: Liberty is the mother of virtue, not its daughter.
author: Étienne de La Boétie

quote: Freedom is a state of mind that no chains can bind.
author: Yasunari Kawabata

quote: The chains of habit are too light to be felt until they are too heavy to be broken.
author: Warren Buffett

quote: Freedom is the fruit of struggle.
author: Eugene V. Debs

quote: The free man is a warrior.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: Freedom is the path to self-discovery.
author: Anaïs Nin

quote: To see the truth and not speak it is cowardice.
author: Confucius

quote: Freedom is the right to grow, not to rot.
author: Aung San Suu Kyi

quote: The unfree soul is like a bird in a storm.
author: Rumi

quote: Liberty is the right to choose. Freedom is the result of the right choice.
author: Augustine of Hippo

quote: Freedom is the fire that melts all chains.
author: Rigoberta Menchú

quote: To live free is to live in truth.
author: Václav Havel

quote: The free mind is the creative mind.
author: Ida B. Wells

quote: Freedom is the dance of the soul in the rain of possibilities.
author: Dejan Stojanovic

quote: The freest people are those who rule their own thoughts.
author: Ali ibn Abi Talib

quote: Freedom is not a gift; it’s a birthright waiting to be claimed.
author: Leymah Gbowee

quote: A river does not drink its own water; a tree does not eat its own fruit. True freedom is living for others.
author: African Proverb

quote: Freedom is the art of living without apology.
author: Bryant McGill

quote: The wings of freedom are born of wisdom and compassion.
author: Dalai Lama

quote: To be free is not to escape the storm, but to dance in the rain.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: Freedom is the song of the heart that refuses to be silenced.
author: Audre Lorde

quote: The path to freedom begins in the mind.
author: Shunryu Suzuki

quote: Liberty is the soul’s right to breathe.
author: Henry Ward Beecher

quote: Freedom is the courage to see the world as it is and still love it.
author: Romain Rolland

quote: The chains of silence are the heaviest to break.
author: Desmond Tutu

quote: Freedom is the heartbeat of humanity.
author: Ellen Johnson Sirleaf

quote: A free man is a creator, not a creature.
author: José Martí

quote: Freedom is the bridge between dreams and reality.
author: Yuri Kochiyama

quote: The unfree mind is a caged bird; education breaks the lock.
author: Malala Yousafzai

quote: Freedom is the art of balancing rights with responsibility.
author: Kofi Annan

quote: To be free is to live without the weight of hatred.
author: Nelson Mandela

quote: Freedom is the canvas where the soul paints its purpose.
author: Pablo Neruda

quote: Liberty is the soil where justice grows.
author: Wangari Maathai

quote: The freest person is the one with the most love.
author: Thich Nhat Hanh

quote: Freedom is the right to be imperfect.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: A nation’s greatness is measured by how it treats its weakest members.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: Freedom is the light that darkness cannot extinguish.
author: John Lewis

quote: The unfree world is a mirror; break it and see your true self.
author: Nawal El Saadawi

quote: Freedom is the journey of becoming who you were born to be.
author: Paulo Freire

quote: Liberty is the heartbeat of the earth.
author: Oodgeroo Noonuccal

quote: To be free is to live as if the impossible were possible.
author: Gloria E. Anzaldúa

quote: Freedom is the echo of every act of courage.
author: Aung San Suu Kyi

quote: The soul’s wings are made of freedom and truth.
author: Hafez

quote: Freedom is the art of embracing uncertainty.
author: Viktor Frankl

quote: A free mind cannot be colonized.
author: Ngũgĩ wa Thiong'o

quote: Liberty is the fruit of solidarity.
author: Lech Wałęsa

quote: Freedom is the right to write your own story.
author: Chimamanda Ngozi Adichie

quote: The path to freedom is paved with questions, not answers.
author: Jiddu Krishnamurti
